# README

This package is the companion *R* package to the paper by [*"On Optimization over Tail Distributions"*](https://arxiv.org/abs/1711.00573)  Mottet, C. and Lam, H.. It is designed to solve program (24) using the generalized linear programming (GLP) procedure described in Algorithm 1.

It can be installed in *R* using the command

```
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cmottet/GLP")
```
